Accred Code: Qualification Structure and SCQF Credit Rating (Accreditation)

Unit Title: City & Guilds
Certificate in Electrical Power Engineering - Underground Cables at SCQF Level 5

Accred Code:
Certificate in Electrical Power Engineering - Underground Cables at SCQF Level 5.
Candidates must achieve a minimum of 37 credits. 15 credits must come from the mandatory units and a minimum of 12 credits from the optional group A and a minimum of 10 credits from optional group B.
